p: Under the low emission scenario, projections of little auk energy requirements did not differ with time, except in January where a slight difference between 2010 and 2095 was found ( figure 4, table 2, November: F 2,27 = 2.69, p = 0.086, December: F 2,27 = 0.49, p = 0.61, January: F 2,27 = 3.7, p = 0.038, February: F 2,27 = 2.88, p = 0.074). Under the high emission scenario, there was a significant decrease in energy requirements with time, for each month ( figure 4, table 2, November: F 2,27 = 63.5, December: F 2,27 = 99.1, January: F 2,27 = 42.8, February: F 2,27 = 46.3, all p < 0.0001).
